title: Is there a way back to old client?
body: I prefer using the old client because the new one makes my computer run a lot slower. Is there any way I can use the old client instead of the new one?

replies.body: The quickest way is by selecting Launch Legacy Client under the Sign-in Button at the login page.  We updated our [pinned thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/udU4bGfj-experiencing-issues-with-the-updated-client-open-beta-we-got-you) to include steps towards returning to the legacy client as well.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Yep, go to your League folder
Do this:
RADS>System
Open user.cfg
Change leagueClientOptIn = yes
to leagueClientOptIn = no
